trans-unit.source: Displays a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.
trans-unit.target: Viser en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> i som en avmerkingsboks vises til venstre for hvert element.

trans-unit.source: This control presents a list of items that the user can navigate by using the keyboard or the scrollbar on the right side of the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne kontrollen viser en liste med elementer som brukeren kan navigere ved hjelp av tastaturet eller rullefeltet på høyre side av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The user can place a check mark by one or more items and the checked items can be navigated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan Merk av ett eller flere elementer og avmerkede elementene kan navigere gjennom med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til objekter i listen ved kjøretid, kan du tilordne en matrise av objektreferanser med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The list then displays the default string value for each object.
trans-unit.target: Listen viser deretter streng standardverdien for hvert objekt.

trans-unit.source: You can add individual items to the list with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til individuelle elementer i listen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedListBox object supports three states through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> enumeration: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet CheckedListBox støtter tre tilstander via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>opplisting: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: You must set the state of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> in the code because the user interface for a CheckedListBox does not provide a mechanism to do so.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi tilstanden til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>i koden fordi brukergrensesnitt en CheckedListBox har ikke mekanisme for å gjøre so.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A> is `true`, the CheckedListBox will recognize and expand tab characters in an item's text, creating columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>er `true`, CheckedListBox skal gjenkjenner og utvide tabulatortegn i et element teksten opprettelse av kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>

trans-unit.source: These tab stops are preset and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Disse kategorien stopper er forhåndsdefinert og kan ikke endres.

trans-unit.source: To use custom tab stops, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A> to `false`, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A> to `true`, and add the custom values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke egendefinerte kategorien stopper, kan du angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>til `false`, angitt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A>til `true`, og Legg til egendefinert verdiene som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> property will be ignored and replaced with standard tab offsets.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>egenskapen `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A>egenskapen blir ignorert og erstattet med standard kategorien forskyvningene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedListBox class supports the following three indexed collections: |Collection|Encapsulating Class| |----------------|-------------------------| |All items contained in the CheckedListBox control.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>| |Checked items (including items in an indeterminate state), which is a subset of the items contained in the CheckedListBox control.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>| |Checked indexes, which is a subset of the indexes into the items collection.
trans-unit.target: Klassen CheckedListBox støtter følgende tre indekserte samlinger: | Samlingen | Bygger inn klassen | |----------------|-------------------------| | Alle elementer i CheckedListBox-kontroll. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>| | Avmerkede elementer (inkludert elementer i en ubestemt tilstand), som er et delsett av elementene i kontrollen CheckedListBox. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>| | Avmerkede indekser, som er et delsett av indeksene i elementsamlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>| The following three tables are examples of the three indexed collections that the CheckedListBox class supports.
trans-unit.target: Disse indeksene angi elementer i en avmerkede eller ubestemt tilstand. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>| De tre tabellene følgende er eksempler på tre indekserte samlinger som støtter klassen CheckedListBox.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: The first table provides an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control).
trans-unit.target: Den første tabellen inneholder et eksempel på indekserte samlingen av elementer i kontrollen (alle elementer i kontrollen).

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item|Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |0|Object 1|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| |1|Object 2|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| |2|Object 3|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| |3|Object 4|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| |4|Object 5|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| The second table provides an example of the indexed collection of the checked items.
trans-unit.target: | Indeksen | Elementet | Kontroller statusen | |-----------|----------|-----------------| | 0 | Objekt 1 | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| | 1 | Objekt 2 | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| | 2 | Objektet 3 | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| | 3 | Objektet 4 | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| | 4 | Objektet 5 | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| Den andre tabellen inneholder et eksempel på indekserte samlingen av avmerkede elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item| |-----------|----------| |0|Object 2| |1|Object 4| |2|Object 5| The third table provides an example of the indexed collection of indexes of checked items.
trans-unit.target: | Indeksen | Elementet | |-----------|----------| | 0 | Objekt 2 | | 1 | Objektet 4 | | 2 | Objektet 5 | Den tredje tabellen inneholder et eksempel på indekserte samlingen av indekser for merkede elementer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> and the `ResizeRedraw` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to specify that the control is redrawn when resized.
trans-unit.target: Som standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>bruker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>og `ResizeRedraw` verdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>til å angi at kontrollen tegnes når størrelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: Collection of checked indexes in this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Samling av avmerkede indekser i dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The collection of checked indexes is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av avmerkede indekser er et delsett av indeksene i samlingen av alle elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: Disse indeksene angi elementer i en avmerkede eller ubestemt tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> collection for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>samling for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: Collection of checked items in this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Samling av avmerkede elementer i dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The collection is a subset of the objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> collection, representing only those items whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> is `Checked` or `Indeterminate`.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen er et delsett av objekter i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>samling, som representerer bare de som der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName>er `Checked` eller `Indeterminate`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The indexes in this collection are in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: Indeksene i denne samlingen er i stigende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> collection for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>samling for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om avmerkingsboksen skal velges når et element.

trans-unit.source: CheckOnClick indicates whether the check box should be toggled whenever an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: CheckOnClick angir om avmerkingsboksen skal velges når et element.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to change the selection on the first click, and then have the user click again to apply the check mark.
trans-unit.target: Standard virkemåte er å endre utvalget ved første Klikk, og deretter kan vedkommende klikker på nytt for å bruke merket.

trans-unit.source: In some instances, however, you might prefer have the item checked as soon as it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: I noen tilfeller kan imidlertid du kanskje foretrekke har element avmerkede så snart den klikkes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the check mark is applied immediately; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis merket brukes umiddelbart. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Click event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Klikk-hendelsen sender en <xref:System.EventArgs>til hendelsesbehandlingen så bare indikerer at det har oppstått et klikk.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (such as the button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> events, which pass a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger mer spesifikke musen-informasjon (for eksempel knappen, antall Klikk, hjulet rotasjon eller plassering), kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>hendelser, som sendes en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs>i hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Dobbeltklikk bestemmes av innstillinger for mus av brukerens operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The user can adjust the amount of time that can pass between clicks during a double-click of a mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan justere mengden tidsintervallet mellom Klikk under Dobbeltklikk museklikk.

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised every time the user double-clicks a control.
trans-unit.target: Klikk denne hendelsen oppstår hver gang brukeren dobbeltklikker en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event-handling methods for the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a form, the events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both event-handling methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har hendelseshåndtering metoder for Klikk for eksempel og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>hendelser i et skjema hendelsene aktiveres når skjemaet er dobbeltklikker og kalles begge hendelseshåndtering metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If the user double-clicks a control that does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the Click event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren dobbeltklikker en kontroll som ikke støtter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>hendelse, klikk hendelse kan oppstå to ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt tilgjengelighet-objekt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke eksplisitt kalle metoden CreateAccessibilityInstance, den kan kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>egenskapen det refereres til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke hente eller angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>-egenskapen, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samling installert med .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the item collection.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av elementsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> that represents the new item collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>som representerer det nye elementsamlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>egenskapen skal ikke overstyres og brukes til å justere egenskapene for den utledede kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>

trans-unit.source: Properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>må angis av de tilsvarende egenskapene i kontrollen for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>kan bare utvides når du wrapping en standard Windows Kontrollklasse eller angi stiler ikke leveres av Windows Forms-navneområdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter kontrollparametere, se den `CreateWindow` og `CreateWindowEx` funksjoner og `CREATESTRUCT` strukturen dokumentasjon i Windows Platform SDK-referanse, finnes ikke i MSDN-biblioteket på http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required parameters.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som inneholder de nødvendige parameterne.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datakilden for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An object representing the source of the data.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer kilden til dataene.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies a property of the objects contained in the list box whose contents you want to display.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en streng som angir en egenskap for objekter i listen som har innhold som du vil vise.

trans-unit.source: By default the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> displays the default string for the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>viser standardstrengen for elementene den inneholder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> can display diverse types of objects and you may want to change the displayed string by specifying the DisplayMember property.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>kan vise forskjellige typer objekter, og du vil endre vises strengen ved å angi egenskapen DisplayMember.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not exist, or the value of the DisplayMember property is an empty string (""), the results of the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A> method are displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte egenskapen finnes ikke, eller verdien for egenskapen DisplayMember er en tom streng (""), resultatene av objektets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A>metoden vises i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the new value of the DisplayMember cannot be set, the previous value is maintained.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den nye verdien for DisplayMember ikke kan angis, beholdes forrige verdi.

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the name of a property of the objects contained in the list box.
trans-unit.target: En tekststreng som angir navnet på en egenskap for objekter i listen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en visual del av en eier tegnes <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref> endringer.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er brukt av en eier tegnes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen oppstår bare når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å utføre oppgaver som er nødvendig for å tegne elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable-sized item (that is, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> event is raised before the item is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har en variabel størrelse elementet (det vil si <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>denne hendelsen oppstår før elementet tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the DrawItem event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>-hendelsen for å angi størrelsen på elementet som du skal tegne i hendelsesbehandlingen for hendelsen DrawItem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the mode for drawing elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir modus for å tegne elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Always a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is checked.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om det er merket av for det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: GetItemChecked returns `true` if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> is `Checked` or `Indeterminate` for the item.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer GetItemChecked `true` Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>er `Checked` eller `Indeterminate` for elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: To determine the specific state the item is in, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå tilstanden elementet er i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet er sjekket; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Den index angitt er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: -or- The index specified is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: - eller - index er større enn eller lik antallet elementer i listen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the check state of the current item.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir Kontroller statusen for gjeldende element.

trans-unit.source: The GetItemCheckState method provides the ability to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value of an item, given the index.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetItemCheckState gjør mulighet å hente den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>verdien for et element, gitt indeksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: If you never set the check state of an item to `Indeterminate`, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du aldri angi kontroller tilstanden til et element for `Indeterminate`, deretter bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to get the checked value of.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet du vil hente avmerkede verdien for.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The index specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Den index angitt er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: -or- The index specified is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: - eller - index er større enn eller lik antallet elementer i listen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når endres status til et element.

trans-unit.source: The check state is not updated until after the ItemCheck event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller statusen oppdateres ikke før etter at hendelsen ItemCheck.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the item area.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden til elementet-området.

trans-unit.source: This measurement is based on the font height plus a small margin to provide white space around the item.
trans-unit.target: Dette målet er basert på skriften høyden pluss en liten marg oppgi mellomrom rundt elementet.

trans-unit.source: The extenders of characters such as "g" and "y" do not display properly when the font is changed to 9.75-point Arial.
trans-unit.target: Extender-enheter tegn, for eksempel "g" og "y" vises ikke riktig når skriften endres til 9.75 punkt Arial.

trans-unit.source: To correct this, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and override ItemHeight to return `base.ItemHeight+2`.
trans-unit.target: Slik løser du dette avledet en klasse fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>og overstyre ItemHeight til å returnere `base.ItemHeight+2`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the item area.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på området elementet i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av elementer i dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Items property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen element kan du skaffe en referanse til listen over elementer som er lagret i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Med denne referansen kan du legge til elementer, Fjern elementene og få et antall elementer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om oppgavene som kan utføres med elementsamlingen, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>klasse referanse emner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> collection representing the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>som representerer elementene i samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> is created and the sizes of the list items are determined.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en eier tegnes <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> opprettes og størrelsen på listeelementer fastsettes.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size of an item before it is drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for denne hendelsen til å angi størrelsen på et element før den tegnes den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen oppstår bare når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale høyden på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>elementet er 255 piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref> kontroll med musen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method selects or clears the check box of the item that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnClick velger eller fjerner merket for elementet som klikkes.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A> property is set to `true`, the check box is switched from a selected or cleared state the first time the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>er satt til `true`, avmerkingsboksen er byttet fra gangen aktivert eller deaktivert tilstand først elementet klikkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the check box is switched only if the item is already selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, er merket for byttet Hvis elementet er allerede valgt.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnClick kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> objekt med detaljene

trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemCheckEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If the spacebar is pressed and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the OnKeyPress method switches the check state of the item currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mellomrom trykkes og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>ikke settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnKeyPress metoden bytter Kontroller statusen for elementet som er valgt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fylle i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller motta standardverdier for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>som nærmer innen rimelighetens grenser veiledning for Windows-grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: Justeringer fortsatt være nødvendig for bestemte programmer.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer kontrollens interne mellomrommet egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Parses all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> items again and gets new text strings for the items.
trans-unit.target: Analyserer alle <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref> elementer på nytt og henter nye tekststrenger for elementer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the selection mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir valgmodusen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionMode property determines whether one item in the list box can be selected or no items can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectionMode bestemmer om ett element i listen kan velges, eller ingen elementer kan velges.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> objects, multiple selection is not supported.
trans-unit.target: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>objekter flervalg ikke støttes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can set the mode to one item or no items.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi modus ett element eller ingen elementer.

trans-unit.source: Either the <xref uid="langword_csharp_One" name="One" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref> value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Either the <xref uid="langword_csharp_One" name="One" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref> value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a value that is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_One" name="One" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å tilordne en verdi som ikke er en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"> </xref> verdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_One" name="One" href=""> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MultiExtended" name="MultiExtended" href=""></xref> value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> to the control.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å tilordne den <xref uid="langword_csharp_MultiExtended" name="MultiExtended" href=""> </xref> verdien <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"> </xref> til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Sets <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> for the item at the specified index to <xref uid="langword_csharp_Checked" name="Checked" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> for elementet i den angitte indeksen til <xref uid="langword_csharp_Checked" name="Checked" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a value of `true` is passed, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value to `Checked`.
trans-unit.target: Når en verdi for `true` sendes, denne metoden angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>verdi til `Checked`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: A value of `false` sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> to `Unchecked`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien `false` angir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>til `Unchecked`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to set the check state for.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet du vil angi Kontroller statusen for.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the item as checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi elementet som kontrolleres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Angitt indeks er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: -or- The index is greater than the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: - eller - indeksen er større enn antallet elementer i listen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the check state of the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Angir kontroller tilstanden til elementet i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The SetItemCheckState method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetItemCheckState opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>

trans-unit.source: Items whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> is set to `Indeterminate` appear with a check mark in the check box, but the box is grayed to indicate the indeterminate status of the checked item.
trans-unit.target: Som med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>er satt til `Indeterminate` vises med en hake i avmerkingsboksen, men boksen er deaktivert for å angi ubestemt statusen for det merkede elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to set the state for.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for element for å angi innstillinger for.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The index specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Den index angitt er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: -or- The index is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: - eller - index er større enn eller lik antallet elementer i listen.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the values.
trans-unit.target: Den value er ikke én av de verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check boxes have a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Flat" name="Flat" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om avmerkingsboksene har en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"> </xref> av <xref uid="langword_csharp_Flat" name="Flat" href=""> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the check box has a flat appearance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis avmerkingsboksen har en flat utseendet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om du vil bruke den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> klassen ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"> </xref> klassen ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) til å gjengi tekst.

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Den `UseCompatibleTextRendering` egenskapen er ikke ment å gi visual kompatibilitet mellom Windows Forms-Kontroller at gjengivelse tekst ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>klassen og [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] og [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] programmer som utfører gjengivelse av egendefinert tekst ved hjelp av <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klasse.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller Hvis programmet ikke blir oppgradert fra [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], anbefales det at du har forlatt `UseCompatibleTextRendering` satt til standardverdien for `false`.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] basert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>klassen ble introdusert i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] for å forbedre ytelsen, gjør teksten se bedre, og forbedre støtte for internasjonale skrifter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: I tidligere versjoner av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] basert <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klassen ble brukt til å utføre gjengivelse av alle text.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]beregner tegnavstand og tekstbryting forskjellig fra [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: I et Windows Forms-program som bruker den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klasse for å gjengi tekst, dette kan føre til at teksten for kontroller som bruker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>vises forskjellig fra teksten i applikasjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere for å løse denne versjoner av `UseCompatibleTextRendering` egenskapen `true` for en bestemt kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Angi `UseCompatibleTextRendering` til `true` for alle støttede kontroller i programmet, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode med en parameter for `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> klassen som skal brukes til å utføre teksten gjengivelse for kompatibilitet med versjon 1.0 og 1.1.

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: av .NET Framework; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property of the data source from which to draw the value.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en streng som angir egenskapen å tegne verdien fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Specify the contents of the ValueMember property in cases where you bind data.
trans-unit.target: Angi innholdet i ValueMember-egenskapen i tilfeller der du binder data.

trans-unit.source: You can clear the ValueMember property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fjerne ValueMember-egenskapen ved å sette egenskapen til en tom streng ("") eller `null`.

trans-unit.source: Setting a new ValueMember property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMemberChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen for en ny ValueMember-egenskap opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMemberChanged>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMemberChanged>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the property of the data source from which to draw the value.
trans-unit.target: En tekststreng som angir egenskapen å tegne verdien fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The specified property cannot be found on the object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte egenskapen finnes ikke på objektet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMember*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMember*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Processes the command message the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control receives from the top-level window.
trans-unit.target: Behandler kommandoen meldingen i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref> kontroll mottar fra vinduet på øverste nivå.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> the top-level window sent to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> vinduet på øverste nivå er sendt til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.
